title: Episode 33: Timeout Revisited - Dealing with Challenging Kids Part 1
description:
In part of 1 of this interview Dr. J. Stuart Ablon we talk those children for whom timeout sometimes does not work. What’s your alternative then? Listen in and learn about the Collaborative Problem...

Show notes and more available at http://www.thepsychfiles.com

itunes:subtitle: Timeout not working for you? Listen to Dr. Ablon talk about the Collaborative Problem Solving model of dealing with challenging children in part 1 of this interview.
author: Michael.Britt@ThePsychFiles.com (Michael Britt)
